_header: In Wiltshire of England two priests there were
_description: Legend of Wulfryk the priest — five stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar2251.First Lines:
IN Wiltshire of ynglond two pristes þer wereRight familyer in
                    goode conversacioun…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…With help of al seyntes In hevene on hyOn alle cristen soulis
                    to have pite and mercy
BLHar2251.Editions:
Halliwell-Phillipps,  James Orchard,
                        ed.  
             A Selection from the Minor Poems of Don John Lydgate.
Percy Society
         2. London: T. Richard, 1840: 72-3.
